items.**SPECIAL NOTE**: when user tries to open the book, print: should you really be reading now?

items.description: A chess board... you can play with friends or by yourself if you're lonely.

items.description: A flat-screen display mounted on the wall or placed on a stand, used for entertainment.

items.description: A long table where meals are served, made with high quality wood vaneer.

items.description: A lone strand of spaghetti, blanketed with a layer of marinara sauce and bits of parmesan.

items.description: An old crusty lamp, looks like it could have belonged to your grandma.

items.description: A spatula; upon inspection, it's made of silicone, too flimsy to kill anyone with...

items.description: A huge container of CeraVe moisturizer; someone's got dry skin...

items.description: A toothbrush left in pristine condition. It's either brand new or someone doesn't clean their teeth...

items.description: A showercap. A cap you put on in the shower.

items.description: A cactus plant. They really do have every type of plant in here huh?
